title: Cassiopeia Builds (Tear or RoA)
body:
So I just started playing her, and I am not sure what to get on her, I have seen that generally you either go tear, or RoA and not both (unlike what you do on Kassadin). Since I just got her, I seem to just get tear and RoA and then Rylias, boots, void and deathcap.
But which is better for her and what is generally some solid items to get on Cass? Tear or RoA? spellvamp?
HELP ME OUT HEREER

replies.body:
Seraphs - Rylais - Sorc Shoes - D'cap - situational - situational. Last 2 are usually Zhonya's and Abysall or GA.

{{item:3040}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3089}}  can also add {{item:3001}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3152}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3026}}  whatever is needed

Tear is basically a given based on her E passive (the giving back mana) and the fact that she is completely a late game champ.

Other then that Raba's is core, Abysal/Zhonya's is probably a decent defense item on her, RoA is probably pretty average (you get your passive E give back health fairly early, and using it on a dead minion gives mana back.)
